title: Ambrosia India Bistro
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In Old Monterey, within walking distance of the conference center, this place offers a lunch buffet and a la carte dinner. Has a separate menu of vegan and vegetarian items that include appetizers, soups, salads, entrees, and bread. White tablecloths and a large window looking out on a small courtyard with fountains. The lunch buffet usually has a vegan item with others containing dairy.
